item.title: Integrated Standby Flight Display (ISFD) System – Attitude Display

numlitem.para: Operations are conducted in Day VMC only, and
Operations are not conducted into known or forecast over-the-top conditions.

placard.para: Placard near Flight Display: "ATT IND INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
